full_summary:
==============================================

**Transformers**
---------------

**WS3735643684-Doc3735643734**
-----------------------------

**Tender Details**
-----------------

*   **Reference Number**: WS3735643684-Doc3735643734
*   **Solicitation Number**: WS3735643684
*   **Publication Date**: November 10, 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date**: December 12, 2022 (2:00 PM EST)
*   **Amendment Date**: December 8, 2022

**Bid Instructions**
-------------------

Amendment to Closing Time: Please disregard the previous closing times for the Ariba Discovery posting response and Buyandsell posting. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by December 12, 2022, at 2:00 PM EST. Submissions after the deadline will be declared non-responsive.

**Notice Description**
---------------------

The Department of National Defence (DND), Real Property Operations Detachment (RP Ops Det) Borden, Engineering Department seeks to replace nine (9) various sized transformers in their existing primary distribution system.

**Procurement Information**
-------------------------

*   **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Trade Agreements**: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   **Delivery Region**: Canada
*   **End-User Entity**: Department of National Defence (DND)

**Contact Information**
---------------------

*   **Contact Person**: Pan, Long (SPAC/PSPC)
*   **Email**: [pangi-long@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:pangi-long@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*   **Phone**: None
*   **Location**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

**Notice URL**
-------------

*   http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14602722

Please note that the rewritten text maintains the same level of information as the original while adapting to the markdown format and professional tone. There's approximately 300 characters remaining in the provided 400-word limit to add detailed information. You may choose to include additional details such as:

*   Detailed procurement requirements and specifications for the transformers
*   Evaluation criteria and methods for assessing bidder responses
*   Expected start and end dates for the contract
